title: Outdoor Grills, Professional On-Site Management, Dog Wash
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 31', 'OR Text', '31', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 989 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Copper Terrace offers sleek and stylish apartment homes for lease in the heart of the Denver Tech Center.', 'Enjoy easy access to modern amenities right outside your door, and the ideal location in Centennial, CO, our residents have everything they need nearby.', 'Our newly-renovated apartment homes, located in the desirable Cherry Creek School District, deliver a relaxing sanctuary each and every day while keeping you close to the DTC and minutes from downtown Denver.', 'Schedule your personal tour of Copper Terrace apartments today.', 'Features:', 'Plush Carpeting, Oversized Walk-In Closets, Gas Fireplaces*, Ceiling Fans in Living Areas*, Stainless Steel Appliances, One-, Two-, and Three- Bedroom Residences, Valet Waste- Doorstep Trash Pickup, Open-Concept Living Areas, Fully-Equipped Kitchens, Wood-Style Flooring, Personal Patios/Balconies, Private Fenced Yard *', '* Only available in select apartments', 'Community Amenities:', 'Resident Lounge, Outdoor Lounge Area with Fire Pit, Dog Wash, Online Payments Available, Outdoor Grills, Complete Fitness Center, Open 24/7, Additional Storage*, Newly-Renovated Community, Smoke Free Community, Private Dog Park, Located in the Highly-Rated Cherry Creek School District, Easy access to Light Rail and I-25 Freeway, Professional On-Site Management, Modern Clubhouse with Wi-Fi Access in Common Areas, Near Cherry Creek Reservoir, Detached Garages Available, Conveniently Located Near Denver Tech Center, Resort-Inspired Pool', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'We allow 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet Fee $200.00 non-refundable (per pet), Pet Deposit: $200.00 refundable (per pet), & Pet Rent $35.00 per month/per pet.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', '5h2fLjoAJX']
